title: Scot_SJI
author: Scot_SJI
content: We build these in Toronto Canada, and we have units in stock and ready to ship within 1-2 weeks of selecting options.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wbr2C32bpQc

comments.author: Skot
comments.body: Those look cool, I like the smart PDU with CTs on every branch.I think we have different interpretations of "mini" though!

comments.author: Scot_SJI
comments.body: Thanks! Our old units use to be a single assembly that was 3MW. The modular blocks make it possible to do smaller builds. We are also coming out with a 150KW unit that can take 208V power.
